alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Georgetown and Williamsburg Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Santee Cooper Regional Airport to Bull Island. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Kingstree, Pawleys Island, Yawkey South Island, Winyah Bay Entrance, Andrews, North Santee, Rhems, Cades, Oatland, Nesmith, Indiantown, Sampit, Earle, Hebron, Morrisville, Henry, Trio and Warsaw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
